definition: (TCM) to rectify 氣|气[qi4] and transform phlegm
erhua variant of 痰盂[tan2 yu2]
fish brings heat, meat brings phlegm, vegetables and tofu keep you healthy
pinyin: yu2 sheng1 huo3 , rou4 sheng1 tan2 , qing1 cai4 dou4 fu5 bao3 ping2 an1
containing_words.word: 魚生火，肉生痰，青菜豆腐保平安

sentences.english: A non-productive cough does not expel sputum from the respiratory tract.

sentences.english: Is the phlegm thin and white?
sentences.chinese: 他咳吐的痰是稀白的麼？

sentences.english: It is indicated that childhood asthma should be treated through phlegm and blood-stasis.

sentences.english: He has been coughing up rusty or GREenish-yellow phlegm.
sentences.chinese: 他咳嗽，並帶有綠黃色的痰。

sentences.chinese: 痰液抗酸性塗片爲陽性且培養結果爲非結核分枝桿菌。

sentences.english: Phlegm basic theories of Chinese medicine physical theory is an important part.
sentences.chinese: 痰溼體質學說是中醫基礎理論的重要內容之一。

sentences.chinese: 不久，他在痰中發現了血。

sentences.english: To observe the cure effect of Tanreqing Injection on children hand-foot-mouth disease.

sentences.chinese: 咽喉左側幹疼，伴有咳嗽，白黃相間色痰。

sentences.english: I have a persistent cough. I cough up a lot of phlegm(thick spit)on most days.
sentences.chinese: 我不停地在咳，多半時間咳出濃濃的痰。

definition: clotted blood/extravasated blood (leaking into surrounding tissue)/thrombosis
bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
bodily fluids (general term in Chinese medicine)
